publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5760 Phil Gallie: Airdrie-Bathgate Railway and Linked Improvements Bill - Final Stage—That the Parliament agrees that the Airdrie-Bathgate Railway and Linked Improvements Bill be passed. Supported by: Alasdair Morgan*
